subject: Cycling, Road
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Marcel Kittel of Germany, who finished first in four stages of the Tour de France last year, began this year’s race with a victory in England on Saturday.
snippet: Marcel Kittel of Germany, who finished first in four stages of the Tour de France last year, began this year’s race with a victory in England on Saturday.
